title: NFL Football Fanatic
overview: Each week on NFL Football Fanatic, Darren McMullen visit a different American city to learn about the unique take they have on football fandom, with real "super-fans" as his guides. He'll explore all aspects of NFL traditions and experiences, with behind-the scenes access to players, coaches, and other iconic football figures during team practices and pre-game warmups. By the end of the series, our host will finally have a team to call his own and fans will appreciate the game in a whole new way.
